title: How to Find Someone on Twitter by Phone Number

steps.title: Open Twitter.
steps.content: Open Twitter. Since you can only sync your contacts with a phone, you'll need to use a phone or tablet to continue. [1] X Research source The app icon features a bluebird and tapping it will open the app.

steps.title: Tap your profile icon.
steps.content: Tap your profile icon. It's in the top left corner of your screen and will prompt a menu to slide out from the left. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Settings and privacy.
steps.content: Tap Settings and privacy . You'll find this near the bottom of the menu. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Privacy and safety.
steps.content: Tap Privacy and safety . This menu option is near the middle of the menu next to an icon of a shield. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Discoverability and contacts.
steps.content: Tap Discoverability and contacts . It's at the bottom of the "Your Twitter activity" section next to a magnifying glass with an avatar icon in the middle. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the switch next to Sync address book contacts to turn it on .
steps.content: Tap the switch next to Sync address book contacts to turn it on . If the app asks for permissions to access your contacts, tap Allow to continue. In case this switch is already on when you navigate here, tap it twice to turn it off and back on. Turning it off will not remove current Twitter contacts, but turning it on again will prompt Twitter to search your contacts to find any new phone numbers that are linked to an account. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Open Twitter.
steps.content: Open Twitter. The app icon features a bluebird and tapping it will open the app.

steps.title: Tap your profile icon.
steps.content: Tap your profile icon. It's in the top left corner of your screen and will prompt a menu to slide out from the left.

steps.title: Tap Settings and privacy.
steps.content: Tap Settings and privacy . You'll find this near the bottom of the menu.

steps.title: Tap Privacy and safety.
steps.content: Tap Privacy and safety . This menu option is near the middle of the menu next to an icon of a shield.

steps.title: Tap Discoverability and contacts.
steps.content: Tap Discoverability and contacts . It's at the bottom of the "Your Twitter activity" section next to a magnifying glass with an avatar icon in the middle. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the switch next to Let others find you by your phone to turn it off .
steps.content: Tap the switch next to Let others find you by your phone to turn it off . A grey or white toggle means the feature is off and people who have you in their contacts list will not discover your Twitter account when they sync their address book. [8] X Research source You can also disable your email here as well so no one can find you with your email address.

steps.title: Go to https://twitter.com and sign in.
steps.content: Go to https://twitter.com and sign in. You can use any desktop web browser to do this.

steps.title: Click … .
steps.content: Click … . It's labeled "More" on the left side of the page and will open a menu.

steps.title: Click Settings and privacy.
steps.content: Click Settings and privacy . You'll see this near the bottom of the menu next to an icon of a gear.

steps.title: Click Privacy and safety.
steps.content: Click Privacy and safety . It's in the center panel under the heading "Settings."

steps.title: Click Discoverability and contacts.
steps.content: Click Discoverability and contacts . You'll see this in the panel on the right side of the page under the header "Your Twitter activity." [9] X Research source

steps.title: Click the box next to Let people who have your phone number find you on Twitter to uncheck it .
steps.content: Click the box next to Let people who have your phone number find you on Twitter to uncheck it . An empty box means the setting is disabled and people who have you in their contacts list will not discover your Twitter account when they sync their address book. [10] X Research source You can also disable your email here as well so no one can find you with your email address.
